name: Rap Jam: Volume One
overview: HIT THE COURTS! Play some serious b-ball with America's hottest Rappers -- including Warren G, Public Enemy, Queen Latifah, Naughty by Nature, Yo-Yo, LL Cool J, House of Pain, Coolio and Onyx -- each with a special slammin' move. Mow 'em down with unbelievable Hang Time Jams! Crush the defense with a Helicopter Jam and slice 'em with a Somersault Slam. Forget regulation play -- it's survival of the fittest when you're pushin', shovin' and jammin' in the streets of Chicago, L.A., New York, Houston and Atlanta. No rules. No refs. Lots of fun. - Play basketball with your favorite rap stars! - Toss a wicked Fireball for moves too hot for your opponents to handle. - Wrack up big points with Xtra smashes -- Somersault Dunk, Flip Flop Dunk, Incredible Jam and Corkscrew Jam. - Play with up to 4 other players using a multiplayer adapter (available separately).
